ResearchProjectDef.label: transport pod
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct launchable transport pods that you can use to launch people and supplies long distances across the planet's surface.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hospital bed
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to construct hospital beds which increase chance of successful medical work.

ResearchProjectDef.label: multi-analyzer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build multi-analyzers which increase research speed, and allow higher-level research projects, if placed near a research bench.

ResearchProjectDef.label: vitals monitor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build vitals monitors which increase patients treatment quality if placed next to medical beds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ground-penetrating scanner
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build ground-penetrating scanners that can detect drillable resources deep under the surface.

ResearchProjectDef.label: deep drilling
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build deep drills for extracting resources from deep underground. You'll need a ground-penetrating scanner to find the resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: shipbuilding basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to start researching more advanced shipbuilding technologies and eventually build a ship to escape the planet.
